poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
The drunks are tanking up. A real man
Duffs up his partner, while on campus
The dux dumps the dunce.
She dunks him one last time
Then dusts him off her résumé.
He ducks out of her life, not realising
That's what's happened. Dunts a pillar,
Doesn't care. A murmur in its ear,
The dusk's taken him in so gently.
